text: The Evangelical Lutheran Church in Myanmar (Lutheran Bethlehem Church) is a Lutheran denomination in Burma. It is a member of the Lutheran World Federation, which it joined in 2000. It is also a member of the Myanmar Council of Churches. == External links == *Lutheran World Federation listing Category:Lutheran denominations Category:Lutheranism in Asia Category:Stub- Class Lutheranism articles Category:Lutheran World Federation members Category:Evangelical denominations in Asia
title: Evangelical Lutheran Church in Burma
